previewEnable.name: Enable start preview
previewEnable.name[zh_CN]: 启用空格唤醒预览效果
previewEnable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否允许空格唤醒预览效果
previewEnable.description: It is used to control whether the space waking up preview is enabled

remoteThumbnailEnable.name: Load thumbnails for network, mobile, and optical disc directories
remoteThumbnailEnable.name[zh_CN]: 加载网络、手机、光盘目录的缩略图
remoteThumbnailEnable.description[zh_CN]: 将在网络共享、手机及光驱等高延迟设备上加载缩略图，可能会影响加载速度
remoteThumbnailEnable.description: Thumbnails will be loaded for high-latency devices like network shares, phones, and optical drives, which may affect loading speed.

mtpThumbnailEnable.name: Enable show file thumbnail in mtp device(deprecated)
mtpThumbnailEnable.name[zh_CN]: 启用移动存储设备显示缩略图预览(废弃)
mtpThumbnailEnable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否在移动存储设备中显示缩略图预览
mtpThumbnailEnable.description: It is used to control whether show thumbnail of file in mtp device
